data.name: Against All Odds
data.detailed_description:
Check out Neon Blight!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1360660/Neon_Blight/


Recommended For Your Wishlist



Take a moment to add Slaughter League to your Steam Wishlist! You can also Follow to receive updates about development and release dates, and it will help us reach more players.


About the Game



Welcome to the Slaughter League, the next global sports phenomenon. Join ten other athletes in a deadly foot race to the finish line. There are no rules save one: “Finish first or not at all!” So run as fast as you can (mind the flamethrowers), jump as high as possible (around the buzzsaws preferably), and beat the competition (or throw them into a conveniently placed meat grinder).

Do you have what it takes to brave the Slaughter League and survive long enough to claim the top spot?



Square off against your friends and/or enemies in a daring dash to the finish line, dodging deadly devices.

Participate in Classic set piece races and Endurance modes, where the last man dying on a never-ending track wins! Note: Survival is not essential to victory on every track.
Hunt down other competitors in Zombie mode, where an infected competitor tries to bite the rest. Outrun the zombie and survive the traps until the time runs out.
Death CAN be fun and games! Enjoy absurd ragdolling, varied death animations, and world-class commentary. Brutal slaughter has never been more fun.



The Slaughter League is also about creativity: not just in eliminating the competition, but also creating competitive eliminations. After experiencing over 25+ pre-made levels, fire up the Creative mode to make a collection of death traps you can call your very own. Harness the Stage Builder to create original levels, using over two dozen distinct traps and multiple environments from stadiums to jungles to volcanoes, and even to the Moooooooooon!

Create new game modes using an open-ended mode editor, with an easy-to-use rule creation tool. Combine events, conditions, and actions to create original, lethal, and most importantly, entertaining game shows! Share your creations with other players using the built-in user creation browser, or test the twisted inventions of others with your athlete, dripping with style thanks to hundreds of customization options for hair, clothing, and much more.

data.short_description: Water's cut. Rent's due. Jobs are scarce. Time to get rich. Enter the Slaughter League and win against all the odds in a dizzying array of lethal multiplayer races. In this competitive, multiplayer platformer party game, there can only be one winner, so kiss those friendships goodbye!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 and Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 and Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

content_descriptors.notes: Contains cartoon-style animated depictions of blood/gore
